title: mmr silver 3
body:
Hi,
Was placed in bronze 2 and i am currently silver 3 ( i duod alot with a silver 4)
My mmr is around 1048 while the average of silver 5 is 1200 ( saw it in another discussion).
Does this mean that i can drop pretty fast in ranks? duo partner has a slightly higher mmr.
I ask this cuz ive been in bronze and i hated it in there.
And how can i make sure my mmr becomes higher.
I have been climbing recently and i feel like this mmr would screw me over.

replies.body:
>Does this mean that i can drop pretty fast in ranks

Yes, but duoing will mitigate that a bit.

>how can i make sure my mmr becomes higher

By winning more games.

>I ask this cuz ive been in bronze and i hated it in there

Matchmaking is done based on MMR, not tier. When you queue solo, you're playing in Bronze Elo with 1000 MMR anyway.

>I have been climbing recently and i feel like this mmr would screw me over.

Don't worry about it. Dropping ranks can be an OK thing since you regain a sense of progression once you fall down to where you belong. Focus less on your rank and more on improving each game and you won't drop as much.

yep

you wont drop back to bronze, but you might possible drop to s4 if your not careful.
he can still drop to bronze if he loses a lot
yes she can, needs to have bronze 3-4 mmr

Unfortunately there is no magical way to improve your mmr, you just have to win games. Since your mmr is so low for your rank you will probably earn very little LP from wins, and lose quite a bit from losses. So don't get disheartened when you only gain like 10LP for a win, because your still raising your mmr to where it should be :)
